evidence_example.title: EDF: Periodic task with period of 0.5 s
evidence_example.small_descr: This is the example shows a simple periodic task with a frequency of 0.5 s on the FLEX boards.
evidence_example.long_descr:
This is the example shows a simple periodic task with a frequency of 0.5 s on the FLEX boards, including:
  • One task;
  • One periodic alarm controlled by timer T1
  • Support for Evidence Flex
  • EDF scheduling an alarm
